item.title: Duolingo Xp Exploit
item.author: gmail@sivert.pw (Sivert V. Sæther)
item.description: Your browser does not support the video tag! It’s possible for super/pro users to instantly complete speaking only lessons on iOS. How to reproduce Make sure the Duoling app does not have microphone access. Start a round of “Perfect Pronunciation” in the “Practice Hub”. Click continue and when prompted for microphone access, just click cancel. Profit. (Instant perfect lesson!) Summary The bug here seems to be that the iOS prompt for possibly taking the user to the apps permissions in settings, but rather does nothing.
